messages.message: ApiName and/or action was not provided. List of permitted APIs for this token is returned.

payload.name: SPM
payload.description: Returns execution logs of the monitors for the specified project and timeframe.

params.name: APIFORMAT
params.description: The return format of the api call.

params.name: ENVIRONMENT_ID
params.description: The id of the environment.

params.name: EARLIEST_TIME
params.description: The unix time(milliseconds since 01.01.1970 UTC) of the earliest time included in the results.

params.name: LATEST_TIME
params.description: The unix time(milliseconds since 01.01.1970 UTC) of the earliest time included in the results.

params.name: PROJECT_ID
params.description: The id of the project.

returnValues.name: TIMESTAMP
returnValues.description: The time of the execution log (unixe timestamp, milliseconds since 01.01.1970).

returnValues.name: LOCATION_NAME
returnValues.description: The name of the location defined in SPM.

returnValues.name: LOG_MESSAGE
returnValues.description: The message of the execution log.

returnValues.name: STATUS
returnValues.description: The status of the execution. Tells if the script was executed successfully. Does not give a status about if the monitored application is working.

payload.name: SPM
payload.description: Returns execution logs of a single monitor for the specified timeframe.

params.name: APIFORMAT
params.description: The return format of the api call.

params.name: ENVIRONMENT_ID
params.description: The id of the environment.

params.name: EARLIEST_TIME
params.description: The unix time(milliseconds since 01.01.1970 UTC) of the earliest time included in the results.

params.name: LATEST_TIME
params.description: The unix time(milliseconds since 01.01.1970 UTC) of the earliest time included in the results.

params.name: PROJECT_ID
params.description: The id of the project.

params.name: MONITOR_NAME
params.description: The name of the monitor.

payload.name: SPM
